summary: 2011 KIA SORENTO REAR DRIVER SIDE PASSENGER DOOR CANNOT BE OPEN FROM THE OUTSIDE. THIS IS SAFETY MATTER. WE CAN OPEN THE DOOR FROM THE OUTSIDE TO GET OUR CHILDREN OR OTHERS OUT OF CAR IN CASE OF ACCIDENT OR OTHER EMERGENCY?  MY CAR ONLY HAS 58000 MILES ON IT AND THIS ISSUE JUST STARTED.  DUE TO THE SAFETY ASPECT AND THE LARGE NUMBER OF COMPLAINTS REGARDING THIS ISSUE THERE SHOULD BE A KIA RECALL DUE TO THIS DEFECT.
